laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for methicillin-sensitive Staphylococcus aureus for 1 week after admission.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Remained positive despite appropriate antibiotic therapy.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Pericarditis evident, ST segment changes present.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of the ST segment changes seen on repeat ECG after treatment.
